name: EX Drones DEMO 2.0
description:
HEY Y'ALL! DEMO 2.0 IS FINALLY HERE! NOW FOR FREE, IF YOU WANT DONATE ME 2$ BECAUSE IT DESERVE THAT, BELIEVE ME ;) SO PROBABLY THIS IS GOING TO BE THE LAST DEMO, EARLY ACCESS IS COMING IN ONE MONTH OR LATER?? I DON'T KNOW MAYBE AROUND 3 MONTHS CAUSE IT'S EARLY ACCESS, AND THEN THE FINAL STEP FULL GAME WITH UPDATES AND MORE!

WHAT DOES EX DRONES DEMO 2.0 INCLUDES?

-BRAND NEW LEVELS

-MORE OBJECTIVES

-MORE ENEMIES ADDED

-MUSIC ON MAIN MENU HAS BEEN ADDED

-A SECRET WEAPON IS SOMEWHERE IN THE MAP HIDDEN 

-AND WHEN YOU END ALL THE OBJECTIVES A SURPRISE IS WAITING YOU..

EX Drones  Is An Fps- Adventure Sci-FY, the game is beta and you may notice some bugs, please report them to fix them, we will updating the game as fast as we can.

Anyways THANKS FOR PLAYING EX DRONES!!
